title: 2002 logo
content:
Can't seem to find anything larger as a sample. Hopefully someone might recognize from something this small. Looking for both fonts btw, but the top font is most important.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818211333im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_4913.jpg)
author: akovia

comments.content:
Hello

Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818211333/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
Thanks! Sorry I didn't get back sooner, but had some equipment failure. =/
